actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.

actions.subcommittee: General Farm Commodities, Resource Conservation and Credit
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on General Farm Commodities, Resource Conservation and Credit.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on General Farm Commodities, Resource Conservation and Credit

official_title: To amend the Agricultural Market Transition Act to establish a flexible fallow program under which a producer may idle a portion of the total planted acreage of the loan commodities of the producer in exchange for higher loan rates for marketing assistance loans on the remaining acreage of the producer.
short_title: Food Security and Land Stewardship Act of 2000

summary.text: Food Security and Land Stewardship Act of 2000 - Amends the Agricultural Market Transition Act to establish a flexible fallow program for the 2001 and 2002 crop years under which a producer may idle a portion of the total loan commodity acreage in exchange for higher marketing assistance loan rates on the remaining acreage.

titles.title: Food Security and Land Stewardship Act of 2000

To amend the Agricultural Market Transition Act to establish a flexible fallow program under which a producer may idle a portion of the total planted acreage of the loan commodities of the producer in exchange for higher loan rates for marketing assistance loans on the remaining acreage of the producer.
